thread.title: JEEP wrangler rubicon mopar ONE all-terrain vehicle
thread.title_full: JEEP wrangler rubicon mopar ONE all-terrain vehicle

author: martin hislop I designboom
title: JEEP wrangler rubicon mopar ONE all-terrain vehicle
text:
JEEP wrangler rubicon mopar ONE all-terrain vehicle mar 02, 2017 JEEP wrangler rubicon mopar ONE all-terrain vehicle 

the JEEP ‘wrangler rubicon’ with ‘chief blue’ exterior showcased at the geneva motor show features mopar ‘ONE’, the exclusive, off-road customization package including manufacturer approved off-road accessories, and lift kit . with the mopar ‘ONE’, the already capable all-terrain vehicle increases its off-road performance. 
all images © JEEP 


the JEEP ‘wrangler rubicon’s’ mopar ‘ONE’ upgrades include a slew of features to tackling any terrain: a 2-inch lift kit for added clearance, a steering stabilizer, 17-inch performance ‘gladiator black’ painted cast-aluminum wheels with massive hankook ‘dynapro 265/75 R17′ tyres, front + rear molded splash guards, black fuel filler cap and limited badge. 


the JEEP ‘wrangler rubicon’ mopar ‘ONE’ on display also includes specific exterior customization, adding a unique look that is consistent with the off-road vocation of the all-terrain vehicle: including a black windshield mounted light bar with ultra-bright off-road halogen lights, black front grille and tubular side steps, a vented hood, body-color half doors + painted mirror caps. the ‘wrangler rubicon’ mopar ‘ONE’ is powered by a 2.8-litre 200 horsepower engine, coupled with a five-speed automatic transmission. martin hislop I designboom
